Extension.Name: MP-TVSeries Plugin
Extension.Author: Inker\Zeflash
Extension.Description: MP-TVSeries scans your harddrive for video files, it analyses them by their filenames to determine if its a TV Episode. It then goes online (http://thetvdb.com) and retrieves information about them. You can then browse, manage and play your episodes from inside MP in a nice graphical layout.
